trans-unit.source: Represents an object that identifies an item of content.
trans-unit.target: 表示物件識別項的內容。

trans-unit.source: Derived from <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> identifies a data item through an ordered list of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>、<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>識別資料項目的已排序清單透過<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>項目。

trans-unit.source: Derived from <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> identifies a data item through a set of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>、<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>識別透過一組資料項目<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase" /> 的可修改深層複本。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase" /> 的可修改深層複本。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A>方法建立的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A>遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.`
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>屬性會是`false`即使這個來源<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>屬性 `true.`

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A>（雖然它們可能不能再解析） 會複製資源參考和資料繫結，但不會複製動畫或是目前的動畫值。
